description:
8月12日《中国新歌声》将迎来第五期的学员争夺战，这也是导师盲选的最后一战。不设战队人数上限的新赛制使得导师之间的抢夺更为激烈；获得过台湾金曲奖，有“客语界江蕙”之称的官灵芝亮相，反令导师变成了学员；杰伦小公举脑洞大开为组合学员起奇葩名号。

在本期节目中，帅气的外表搭配独特的嗓音，学员付豪演唱了高凌风《恼人的秋风》和Maroon 5《Wake up call》，一起先来听听吧。（视频的1:10处）

【歌曲小知识】原版看这里

【关于Maroon 5】

Maroon 5 is an American pop rock band that originated in Los Angeles, California. Before the current group was established, the original four members, Adam Levine (lead vocals, lead guitar), Jesse Carmichael (rhythm guitar, backing vocals) Mickey Madden (bass guitar) and Ryan Dusick (drums), formed a band known as Kara's Flowers in 1994, while they were still in high school. The band, which self-released an album called “We Like Digging?”, then signed to Reprise Records and released the album The Fourth World in 1997.Maroon 5（魔力红）乐队是一支起源于加利福尼亚州，洛杉矶的美国乐队。在现在的组合建立之前，最开始的四个成员是，Adam Levine（主唱，主吉他手），Jesse Carmichael（伴奏吉他手，和声歌手），Mickey Madden（贝斯手）和Ryan Dusick（鼓手），1994年当时的乐队名称是Kara's Flowers，然而当时他们还在上高中。乐队的首张个人专辑是《We Like Digging?》，之后他们签约了Reprise唱片公司，并且于1997年发行了专辑《The Fourth World》。

All four singles of the album were highly successful on the Billboard Hot 100, including second single "One More Night", which reached number one for 4 weeks straight. Keyboardist PJ Morton became an official member of the band in 2012, after gaining little success with his previous albums as an R&B vocalist. The addition of PJ Morton meant that for the first time, Maroon 5 had six official members. In 2014, the band signed with Interscope Records and released their fifth studio album, V. Maroon 5 has sold more than 20 million albums and 70 million singles worldwide.他们的全部四张专辑在公告牌Hot 100排行榜上都获得了巨大成功，包括第二首单曲《One More Night》，连续四周占据冠军位置。键盘手PJ Morton在2012年之后，凭借之前为加一些专辑做R&B和声的小成就加入了乐队。PJ Morton的加入也使得Maroon 5乐队首次真正拥有了六位成员。2014年，乐队签约了环球唱片公司，并发布了第五张录音室专辑《V》。Maroon 5已经在全球范围内卖出了超过2000万张专辑和7000万首单曲。

【关于歌曲】

"Wake Up Call" is the second single by Maroon 5 from their second studio album, It Won't Be Soon Before Long. It had been rumored as the second single, and the band confirmed this on the May 22 episode of TRL. The band also said that they are excited to do the music video for the song.《Wake Up Call》是Maroon 5第二张专辑《It Won't Be Soon Before Long》的第二首单曲。这首歌在未放出之前谣传是是第二首单曲，之后乐队在5月22号的（MTV平台）TRL上承认了这个猜测。乐队还说为这首歌制作MV的时候相当激动。

The song was BBC Radio 1 playlisted for the playlist week beginning July 18, 2007. As of June 2014, the song has sold 1,821,000 copies in the US.这首歌自从2007年7月18日，就被列入了BBC1号之声的一周播放单。截止到2014年6月，这首歌在全美卖出了182万份。
